Articles.Content:
![d461d8c7a715.png](http://s017.radikal.ru/i418/1503/50/d461d8c7a715.png)

No comment, but seems... landable
OK, i think I am done with my turn. Time to start a thread for this separate project. I will put a link.

> 
> I think I could give it a go. I'll need permission on a Tylo lander design first, however. It's quite excessive from what the rules state, but it's as compact as I could make it.
> [http://i.imgur.com/hY5Yk0b.png](http://i.imgur.com/hY5Yk0b.png)
> 
> It's about 42.7 of your tons, ***(Classified by log code 41 under conditional 5. If contents are requested, send request as well as access code)***
> 
> I don't really know how a rendezvous would go down with this thing, but I'd be happy to fly it up with your permission.

Hold on- surely that's the launch stage to get it to Tylo, not *just* the Tylo lander! That's huge!

And I took the second turn:

![833b0035c1fa.png](http://s020.radikal.ru/i700/1503/56/833b0035c1fa.png)

And I took the third turn.

By the way, all the pictures are corrupted.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-27T00:31:13Z" title="03/27/2015 12:31  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 27, 2015</time> by Thunderous Echo**
Are we starting the second cycle soon? I wouldn't like to leave the weekend segment without at least someone playing.
Cycle 2 starts Saturday, if no one uses their turn.
Wow at the Kerbin equatorial orbits! I'll make a quick addition AWAY from Kerbin. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
A KSP succession game? Dis is too cool. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

I have placed a refueling station around Jool. It is available for public use, and has docking ports of all sizes. 

![C0702B5FEF6EBC1A2B0D999EBF136EB857C1C95C](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/35241247220963111/C0702B5FEF6EBC1A2B0D999EBF136EB857C1C95C/)

> 
> I have placed a refueling station around Jool. It is available for public use, and has docking ports of all sizes. 
> [http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/35241247220963111/C0702B5FEF6EBC1A2B0D999EBF136EB857C1C95C/](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/35241247220963111/C0702B5FEF6EBC1A2B0D999EBF136EB857C1C95C/)

Welcome, Ashrad! I do love LJO.

P.S. How did it get there?

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> [https://www.dropbox.com/s/k4y10sihn083eqv/Kerbal%20Multiplayer%20Collaboration.7z?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/k4y10sihn083eqv/Kerbal%20Multiplayer%20Collaboration.7z?dl=0)
> here is the new save, I lauched 5 tugs and put down a base. The next user will have to hop the base across Mun to a better spot. Didn't have time to find a better place.

How did those tugs and that base get there?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-27T04:42:26Z" title="03/27/2015 04:42  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 27, 2015</time> by Thunderous Echo**

> 
> P.S. How did it get there?

With brute force! I cleaned up my debris when I finished.

![6742226B077818B1B53EBC6A6EACA6F846C65807](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/35241247221034994/6742226B077818B1B53EBC6A6EACA6F846C65807/)

**It seems that this thread might die if we don't allow users to play again soon. So, should we:**

A) Start a secondary save file

![B)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_cool.png) Prematurely end Cycle 1

> How did those tugs and that base get there?

lotsa patience

And btw, I vote we start the second cycle after we find out if the remaining members wish to parcitipate, if any.

Also, maybe we should mark that all tugs are to be open to public.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-27T14:30:10Z" title="03/27/2015 02:30  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 27, 2015</time> by Yukon0009**

> 
> lotsa patience
> And btw, I vote we start the second cycle after we find out if the remaining members wish to parcitipate, if any.

Okay, but do you have a picture of the craft on the launchpad (or near the beginning of the flight) or a craft file?

[![screenshot25411_zpszbwjyjww.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot25411_zpszbwjyjww.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot25411_zpszbwjyjww.png.html)

[![screenshot25384_zpsfxsyemsj.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot25384_zpsfxsyemsj.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot25384_zpsfxsyemsj.png.html)

My standard tug design.

> 
> [http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot25411_zpszbwjyjww.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot25411_zpszbwjyjww.png)
> [http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot25384_zpsfxsyemsj.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot25384_zpsfxsyemsj.png)
> 
> My standard tug design.

And what launch stage launched the tractors?

(I have to be thorough here, I don't want anyone to cheat).

> 
> It seems that this thread might die if we don't allow users to play again soon. So, should we:
> A) Start a secondary save file
> 
> ![B)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_cool.png) Prematurely end Cycle 1

Maybe we should change the 72 hour rule? Or add a secondary condition (60% of registered players made their turns? Total cycle length of 1 week?) after which it changes to let's say 24 h of inactivity to start new cycle. Otherwise we risk getting stuck to 2-3 turns per week on new players alone.

> 
> Cycle 2 starts Saturday, if no one uses their turn.

Don't worry, Alchemist, we start again on Saturday. Maybe we should change the rule, but I am not sure how. 

BTW, we need a couple more players for the Jool Club, if anyone is interested.

> 
> BTW, we need a couple more players for the Jool Club, if anyone is interested.

 What is the plan for the Jool club? I've already put some fuel there for you.

> 
> Or add a secondary condition (60% of registered players made their turns? Total cycle length of 1 week?)

> 
> Don't worry, Alchemist, we start again on Saturday. Maybe we should change the rule, but I am not sure how

In my opinion, the total cycle length is the best option, although 1 week seems a bit too short to me. Two, perhaps?

> 
> Maybe we should change the 72 hour rule? Or add a secondary condition (60% of registered players made their turns? Total cycle length of 1 week?) after which it changes to let's say 24 h of inactivity to start new cycle. Otherwise we risk getting stuck to 2-3 turns per week on new players alone.

Ah, that's a good plan, because it directly reflects what I'm trying to accomplish. Unless someone has a better idea or this gets substantial disapproval, I think we'll go with his one.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> What is the plan for the Jool club? I've already put some fuel there for you.

Jool Club is on a separate save file. Check Google Drive for more information.

(In addition, pre-sending fuel is against official Ultimate Jool-5 rules.)

> 
> (In addition, pre-sending fuel is against official Ultimate Jool-5 rules.)

Ick. That's too challenging for me. I have no clue how I would do that.

> 
> Ick. That's too challenging for me. I have no clue how I would do that.

What do you mean? You already did...

(You sent a refueling vessel to Jool before the challenge ship was sent)
I think he means launching all in one go without pre-sent fuel would be too hard.
